attributes.action: Stop Brexit and protect the economy post Covid-19
attributes.additional_details:
Many brexit voters were lead to vote this way on many false pretences such as the non existant extra £238million promised to the NHS.
Leading experts have warned that a no deal brexit will be more economically damaging than lockdown. 
This year we have seen the UK debt rise above the GDP. We must protect the lives and livehoods of the people of the UK, and we must protect the NHS. 
It’s time to put pride of delivering a promise aside and do what’s right and protect the economy and the UK
attributes.background: To stop brexit following the economic damage of lockdowns, to prevent the UK plummeting into deeper debts, leaving the country destitute with millions unemployed and impoverished.

rejection.details:
The UK has already left the EU, but you might like to sign the following petitions calling for related actions:

To Seek a 1 year Extension to the Brexit Transition Period & a Second Referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554492

Rule out ending the transition period without a deal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329500

The UK government should apply via Article 49 to rejoin the EU: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552263
